title: REFUSED Launches Kickstarter For Their Career-Spanning Documentary
description:
Exit To End is coming in 2026.
The post REFUSED Launches Kickstarter For Their Career-Spanning Documentary appeared first on Metal Injection.
content: Refused is wrapping up their massively-influential career on December 21 at the Väven venue in Umeå, Sweden, but that's not all we're getting from the band! There's a brand new career-spanning docume… [+2845 chars]
